## Weather

This is a fun and simplified weather display


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
wttr.in
```
:::


or from a [web browser](https://wttr.in/)

## RSS Feeds

[Newsboat](https://newsboat.org/index.html) presented a non intuitive way to get working. The trick was to create the `url` file first in the specified directory and then upload the oplm file to upload established feeds.
